description: I love having fun with guys who know each other well. It’s always amazing to make friends kissing and slowly moving towards more and more naughty stuff. That’s why I was thrilled to see these two guys cleaning a car. I didn’t care they might be busy, I just wanted to have fun with them. The boys met at work and became very good friends. Now was the time to put their friendship to another level. Both were paid quite badly so it wasn’t very hard to undress them. And what a sight that was! They were both nicely lean and ripped. And they were so shy… Almost as if they were scared of touching each other. Money fixed that problem pretty quickly. I took them to one of my flats and there we continued with more dirty stuff. I loved how inexperienced they were. It was hot.
title: Czech Hunter 378
